title: Is there an online service which provides the same functionalities as the Metasploit NASM shell?
content:
Does anyone know if there exists an online service which provides the same functionalities as the Metasploit NASM shell ?
Probably the above script can be ported to a standalone tool but I'm not very confident with Ruby, so if someone knows something already implemented, it will be helpful.

comments.text: The first three tools focuses on disassembling a given sets of opcodes. The Defuse online x86 assembler allows to assemble x86 instructions and translate them in opcodes, wich is exactly what the Metasploit script provides and what I was looking for. Thanks.
